mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDERS LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{page};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (pdt_no, pdt_price, pdt_name, new_item, pst_status , discountable, pdt_amount, notice, delivery_fee, pdt_private) VALUES( #{productNumber}, #{productPrice}, #{productName}, #{newItem}, #{postingStatus}, #{discountable}, #{productAmount}, #{notice}, #{deliveryFee}, #{privateProduct})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET pdt_price = #{productPrice}, pdt_name = #{productName}, new_item = #{newItem}, discountable = #{discountable}, pdt_amount = #{productAmount}, notice = #{notice}, pdt_code = #{productCode}, delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee}, pdt_private = #{privateProduct} WHERE pdt_no = #{productNumber}
